sentences.en: A shared anguish can be a bridge of reconciliation.
sentences.cn: 共同的痛楚能成为和解的桥梁.

sentences.en: Had the reconciliation been so complete that she could act as she pleased?
sentences.cn: 他们的和好是否已经达到如此前嫌尽释的程度,以至她可以不再有所顾忌?

sentences.en: He began to hate himself for throwing away the chance Becky had offered for a reconciliation.
sentences.cn: 他开始憎恨自己,骂自己是个傻瓜,白白放弃了贝基给他言归于好的机会.

sentences.en: He fancied that they were Eustacia, standing there and breathing wishes of reconciliation.
sentences.cn: 他以为那都是游苔莎正站在那轻声低语地说她想要和好.

sentences.en: He was taken up with the reconciliation of husband and wife.
sentences.cn: 他忙于做夫妻间的调解工作.

sentences.en: Her ex-husband had always hoped for a reconciliation.
sentences.cn: 她的前夫一直想和她重归于好。

sentences.en: His selfishness closes the door to our reconciliation.
sentences.cn: 他的自私关上了我们和解的大门.

sentences.en: I offered to act as mediator and tried to bring about a reconciliation between the two parties.
sentences.cn: 我主动充当调解人,促使双方和解.

sentences.en: Michel Ardan determined to effect their reconciliation.
sentences.cn: 米歇尔·阿当决定怂恿他们和解.

sentences.en: The couple have separated but he wants a reconciliation.
sentences.cn: 夫妇俩已经分居了，但是他想要和解。

sentences.en: The crisis trends toward a reconciliation.
The leadership announced a programme of national reconciliation (= an attempt by all sides to end a war or trouble in a country ) .
sentences.cn: 领导层宣布了一个国内各方和解方案。

sentences.en: The treaty has brought a new spirit of reconciliation on both sides.
sentences.cn: 条约使双方产生了新的和解精神。

sentences.en: The two sisters apparently bashed each other up when their long overdue reconciliation turned sour.
sentences.cn: 显然，这姐妹俩早就无法再互相迁就，索性厮打起来。

sentences.en: Their handshake appeared to be a gesture of reconciliation.
sentences.cn: 他们的握手似乎是和解的表示。

sentences.en: There will be a reconciliation between the two countries.
They informed him that they wished reconciliation.
sentences.cn: 他们告诉他,他们愿意和解.

sentences.en: They should not be a threat to reconciliation.
sentences.cn: 它们不应当威胁和解精神.

words.tran_cn: 不矛盾的；可和解的；可调和的
使一致；使和解；调停，调解；使顺从

phrases.tran_cn: 银行对帐单，余额调节表；银行往来调节
帐目核对过程；和解过程

trans.tran_cn: 和解，调停，一致，服从，顺从，和谐
trans.tran_en: a situation in which two people, countries etc become friendly with each other again after quarrelling
